description: You can monitor Metrics/Logs of POS in Github-Action processes

value.title: Go to Dashboard (For inspecting warning logs)

targets.query: ga_commit_hash: ${ga_commit_hash:raw} AND ga_workflow: ${ga_workflow:raw} AND ga_detail: ${ga_detail:raw} AND pos_id: ${pos_run_id:raw} AND level: Info
